original_title: The Many Faces of Death, Part 2
overview: This shocking documentary shows never before seen footage, too violent or gruesome to be televised. The Intent of the explicitly graphic shocumentary is to increase your awareness of the tragic true-life horrors that can happen to the unaware! These tragedies can happen to any of us, any day. Beware! Spread the word, help others to understand. WARNING this uncut documentary contains very graphic scenes. For Mature audiences only.
title: The Many Faces of Death, Part 2
